00056     template <> void scalar<float, 1>::init()
00057     {
00058      static bool init_done = false;
00059      if (!init_done)
00060      {
00061        std::string source;
00062        viennacl::ocl::program prog;
00063        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_sub);
00064        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_inplace_mul);
00065        source.append(scalar_align1_inplace_mul);
00066        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_inplace_sub);
00067        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_inplace_add);
00068        source.append(scalar_align1_mul);
00069        source.append(scalar_align1_inplace_sub);
00070        source.append(scalar_align1_inplace_add);
00071        source.append(scalar_align1_inplace_div);
00072        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_inplace_div);
00073        source.append(scalar_align1_divide);
00074        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_add);
00075        source.append(scalar_align1_add);
00076        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_mul);
00077        source.append(scalar_align1_sub);
00078        source.append(scalar_align1_cpu_div);
00079        prog.create(source);
00080 
00081        cpu_sub.prepareInit("cpu_sub", prog);
00082        cpu_inplace_mul.prepareInit("cpu_inplace_mul", prog);
00083        inplace_mul.prepareInit("inplace_mul", prog);
00084        cpu_inplace_sub.prepareInit("cpu_inplace_sub", prog);
00085        cpu_inplace_add.prepareInit("cpu_inplace_add", prog);
00086        mul.prepareInit("mul", prog);
00087        inplace_sub.prepareInit("inplace_sub", prog);
00088        inplace_add.prepareInit("inplace_add", prog);
00089        inplace_div.prepareInit("inplace_div", prog);
00090        cpu_inplace_div.prepareInit("cpu_inplace_div", prog);
00091        divide.prepareInit("divide", prog);
00092        cpu_add.prepareInit("cpu_add", prog);
00093        add.prepareInit("add", prog);
00094        cpu_mul.prepareInit("cpu_mul", prog);
00095        sub.prepareInit("sub", prog);
00096        cpu_div.prepareInit("cpu_div", prog);
00097        init_done = true;
00098      }
00099     }
